TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CancellationTokenSource extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 向应该被取消的 发送信号。

span.span: Signals to a that it should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，.NET Framework 使用统一的模型来协作取消异步操作或长时间运行的同步操作涉及两个对象：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the .NET Framework uses a unified model for cooperative cancellation of asynchronous or long-running synchronous operations that involves two objects: - 一个对象，它提供取消标记通过其属性，并将取消消息通过调用其或方法。A object, which provides a cancellation token through its property and sends a cancellation message by calling its or method. - 一个对象，指示是否请求取消。A object, which indicates whether cancellation is requested. 用于实现协作取消模型的常规模式是：The general pattern for implementing the cooperative cancellation model is: - 实例化 对象，此对象管理取消通知并将其发送给单个取消标记。Instantiate a object, which manages and sends cancellation notification to the individual cancellation tokens. - 将 属性返回的标记传递给每个侦听取消的任务或线程。Pass the token returned by the property to each task or thread that listens for cancellation. - 调用从接收取消标记的操作的方法。Call the method from operations that receive the cancellation token. 提供有关每个任务或线程来响应取消请求的机制。Provide a mechanism for each task or thread to respond to a cancellation request. 无论你选择取消操作和完全操作方式，取决于你的应用程序逻辑。Whether you choose to cancel an operation, and exactly how you do it, depends on your application logic. - 调用 方法以提供取消通知。Call the method to provide notification of cancellation. 这将设置到取消标记的每个副本上的属性`true`。This sets the property on every copy of the cancellation token to `true`. - 调用方法在您使用完对象。Call the method when you are finished with the object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管线程中的取消](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 完成使用类型的实例后，您应释放它直接或间接。When you have finished using an instance of the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的随机数生成器来模拟从 11 个不同的 instruments 读取 10 个整数值的数据收集应用程序。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 零值指示度量已失败的一个检测，这种情况下，应取消操作并没有总体平均值应被计算出来。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要处理可能取消操作，该示例实例化对象，它生成的取消标记传递到对象。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 对象又取消将标记传递到每个任务负责收集特定乐器的读数。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法来确保只有在已成功收集所有读数后计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果某个任务具有不是因为已取消对调用方法将引发异常。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可同时从多个线程，除，它必须仅当使用所有其他操作对象已完成。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of , which must only be used when all other operations on the object have completed.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that will be canceled after the specified delay in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关在倒计时`millisecondsDelay`在构造函数的调用过程开始。The countdown for the `millisecondsDelay` starts during the call to the constructor. 当`millisecondsDelay`到期，构造被取消 （如果它未已取消）。When the `millisecondsDelay` expires, the constructed is canceled (if it has not been canceled already). 对后续调用将重置`millisecondsDelay`用于构建，如果未已取消。Subsequent calls to will reset the `millisecondsDelay` for the constructed , if it has not been canceled already.

span.span: is less than -1.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，在指定的时间跨度后将被取消。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that will be canceled after the specified time span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在构造函数的调用期间启动延迟倒计时。The countdown for the delay starts during the call to the constructor. 延迟过期时，构造取消时，如果未已取消。When the delay expires, the constructed is canceled, if it has not been canceled already. 对后续调用将重置用于构建延迟，如果未已取消。Subsequent calls to will reset the delay for the constructed , if it has not been canceled already.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Communicates a request for cancellation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关联将通知的取消操作并将转换为状态其中，则返回 true。The associated will be notified of the cancellation and will transition to a state where returns true. 与注册的任何回调或可取消操作将执行。Any callbacks or cancelable operations registered with the will be executed. 我们建议可取消操作和回调注册与不会引发异常。We recommend that cancelable operations and callbacks registered with not throw exceptions. 取消此重载将聚合到引发的任何异常，这样，一个回调引发异常不会阻止其他已注册的回调正在执行。This overload of Cancel will aggregate any exceptions thrown into an , such that one callback throwing an exception will not prevent other registered callbacks from being executed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的随机数生成器来模拟从 11 个不同的 instruments 读取 10 个整数值的数据收集应用程序。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 零值指示度量已失败的一个检测，这种情况下，应取消操作并没有总体平均值应被计算出来。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要处理可能取消操作，该示例实例化对象，它生成的取消标记传递到对象。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 对象又取消将标记传递到每个任务负责收集特定乐器的读数。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法来确保只有在已成功收集所有读数后计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果某个任务具有不是因为已取消对调用方法将引发异常。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Cancel(bool throwOnFirstException) cil managed

param.name: throwOnFirstException
param.span: 如果异常应立即传播，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if exceptions should immediately propagate; otherwise, .

summary.span: 如果出现异常，传达取消请求，并指定是否应处理其余回调和可取消操作。

span.span: Communicates a request for cancellation, and specifies whether remaining callbacks and cancelable operations should be processed if an exception occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关联将通知的取消操作并将转换为状态位置返回`true`。The associated will be notified of the cancellation and will transition to a state where returns `true`. 与注册的任何回调或可取消操作将执行。Any callbacks or cancelable operations registered with the will be executed. 将按后进先出顺序以同步方式执行的回调。Callbacks will be executed synchronously in LIFO order. 我们建议可取消操作和回调注册与不会引发异常。We recommend that cancelable operations and callbacks registered with not throw exceptions. 如果`throwOnFirstException`是`true`，对的调用将立即传播异常，阻止其余回调和从正在处理的可取消操作。If `throwOnFirstException` is `true`, an exception will immediately propagate out of the call to , preventing the remaining callbacks and cancelable operations from being processed. 如果`throwOnFirstException`是`false`，此重载将聚合到引发的任何异常，这样，一个回调引发异常不会阻止其他已注册的回调正在执行。If `throwOnFirstException` is `false`, this overload will aggregate any exceptions thrown into an , such that one callback throwing an exception will not prevent other registered callbacks from being executed.

span.span: This has been disposed.

exception.span: 聚合异常包含由相关联的 上已注册的回调引发的所有异常。

span.span: An aggregate exception containing all the exceptions thrown by the registered callbacks on the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关在倒计时`millisecondsDelay`启动该调用中。The countdown for the `millisecondsDelay` starts during this call. 当`millisecondsDelay`到期时，这取消时，如果未已取消。When the `millisecondsDelay` expires, this is canceled, if it has not been canceled already. 对 CancelAfter 的后续调用将重置`millisecondsDelay`此，如果未已取消。Subsequent calls to CancelAfter will reset the `millisecondsDelay` for this , if it has not been canceled already.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

summary.span: 获取是否已请求取消此 。

span.span: Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this .

value.span: 如果已请求取消此 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if cancellation has been requested for this ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否已请求取消此标记的源，例如由于调用其方法。This property indicates whether cancellation has been requested for this token source, such as due to a call to its method. 如果此属性返回`true`，它只保证已请求取消。If this property returns `true`, it only guarantees that cancellation has been requested. 它不保证通过相应的标记注册每个处理程序已完成执行，也取消请求已完成传播到所有已注册处理程序。It does not guarantee that every handler registered with the corresponding token has finished executing, nor that cancellation requests have finished propagating to all registered handlers. 尤其是在其中将同时取消相关的对象的情况下，可能需要附加的同步。Additional synchronization may be required, particularly in situations where related objects are being canceled concurrently.

span.span: Cancellation
Task Cancellation
